Guinness Stout.name: Guiness Stout
Guinness Stout.description: Guinness stout is made from water, barley, roast malt extract, hops, and brewer's yeast. A portion of the barley is roasted to give Guinness its dark colour and characteristic taste.

New Holland The Poet.name: New Holland The Poet
New Holland The Poet.description: Expansive and deep in its malt presence, this is beer to ruminate over in some Victorian-era study with a roaring fireplace and bearskin rug.

Yazoo Fall Lager.name: Yazoo Fall Lager
Yazoo Fall Lager.description: Our Fall Lager builds to a mighty, malty peak and disappears with a crisp hop note. Perfect for porch sitting in a southern Fall.

Little Harpeth Upstream.name: Little Harpeth Upstream
Little Harpeth Upstream.description: Upstream is an amber-colored beer that derives its flavor from American base and color malts and its flavor is offset by the use of Northern Brewer hops.

60 Minute IPA.name: 60 Minute IPA
60 Minute IPA.description: 60 Minute IPA is continuously hopped -- more than 60 hop additions over a 60-minute boil.

Indian Brown Ale.name: Indian Brown Ale
Indian Brown Ale.description: A cross between a Scotch Ale, an India Pale Ale and an American Brown, Indian Brown Ale is well-hopped and malty at the same time (It's magical!).

E&J Brandy.name: E&J Brandy
E&J Brandy.description: E&J has been America's most preferred brandy alcohol since 1975, favored for its smooth taste & authentic style.

Christian Brothers Brandy.name: Christian Brothers Brandy
Christian Brothers Brandy.description: The Christian Brothers VS Brandy is distilled using the same time-honored pot still production method used with fine Cognacs. This exceptional American Brandy is then aged for 2 to 6 years in oak barrels

Jack Daniels No.7.name: Jack Daniels No.7
Jack Daniels No.7.description: Our Tennessee Sippin’ Whiskey is ready only when our tasters say it is. We use our senses, just like Jack Daniel himself did. In fact, more than a century later, our Tennessee Whiskey is still judged the same way.

Gentleman Jack.name: Gentleman Jack
Gentleman Jack.description: Just like Jack Daniel’s Tennessee Whiskey and Jack Daniel’s Single Barrel, Gentleman Jack is charcoal mellowed before going into the barrel. Gentleman Jack, however, receives an additional "blessing" when it is charcoal mellowed again after reaching maturity giving it ultimate smoothness.
